Precondition: User exists with status=ACTIVE and isVerify=true
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Enter email: test@example.com
3. Enter password: password123
4. Click Login
Expected Result:
? Login successful
? Token saved to localStorage
? Redirect to / (Home)
? No error messages

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Enter email: unverified@example.com
3. Enter password: unverified123
4. Click Login
Expected Result:
? Login blocked
? Error: Please verify your email first
? Redirect to /verify-email?email=unverified@example.com
? No token saved

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Enter email: inactive@example.com
3. Enter password: inactive123
4. Click Login
Expected Result:
? Login blocked
? Error: Account inactive. Please verify your email
? Redirect to /verify-email?email=inactive@example.com
? No token saved

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Enter email: suspended@example.com
3. Enter password: suspended123
4. Click Login
Expected Result:
? Login blocked
? Error: Your account has been suspended. Please contact Admin or Inspector for assistance.
? No redirect (stays on login page)
? No token saved

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Enter email: test@example.com
3. Enter password: wrongpassword
4. Click Login
Expected Result:
? Login failed
? Error: Email or password is incorrect
? No redirect
? No token saved

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Enter email: notexist@example.com
3. Enter password: anything
4. Click Login
Expected Result:
? Login failed
? Error: Account not found or Email or password is incorrect
? No redirect
? No token saved

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Leave email empty
3. Enter password: password123
4. Click Login
Expected Result: ? Error: Email and password are required

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Enter email: test@example.com
3. Leave password empty
4. Click Login
Expected Result: ? Error: Email and password are required

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Enter email: notanemail
3. Enter password: password123
4. Click Login
Expected Result: ? Error: Email is invalid

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Enter email: test@example.com
3. Enter password: pass (4 chars)
4. Click Login
Expected Result: ? Error: Password must be at least 6 characters long

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Enter email: test@example.com
3. Enter password: pass12 (6 chars)
4. Click Login
Expected Result:
? Validation passes
? API call made (may fail if wrong password)

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Enter email: test@example.com
3. Enter password: 12345678901234567890 (20 chars)
4. Click Login
Expected Result:
? Validation passes
? API call made (may fail if wrong password)

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Check Remember Me checkbox
3. Enter valid credentials
4. Click Login
Test Data:
Email: test@example.com
Password: password123
Remember Me: checked
Expected Result:
? Login successful
? Remember me preference saved

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Enter valid credentials
3. Click Login
4. Observe UI during API call
Expected Result:
? Button shows loading state
? Form inputs disabled
? Cannot submit again

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Enter invalid credentials
3. Click Login
4. Observe error message
Expected Result:
? Error message displayed in red box
? Error persists until corrected

Precondition: User on login page with error
Test Steps:
1. Trigger an error
2. Correct the input
3. Click Login again
Expected Result:
? Previous error cleared
? New validation runs

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Click Forgot password? link
Expected Result: ? Navigate to /forgot-password

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Click Register now link
Expected Result: ? Navigate to /register

Test Steps:
1. Login with ACTIVE verified user
2. Check redirect
Expected Result:
? Login successful
? Redirect to Home

Test Steps:
1. Login with INACTIVE unverified user
2. Check redirect
Expected Result:
? Login blocked
? Redirect to verify email

Test Steps:
1. Login with SUSPENDED user
2. Check error message
Expected Result:
? Login blocked
? Error message shown
? No redirect

Test Steps:
1. Complete successful login
2. Verify redirect destination
Expected Result:
? Redirect to / (Home)
? NOT redirected by role

Test Steps:
1. Login successfully
2. Check localStorage
3. Refresh page
Expected Result:
? Token saved in localStorage
? Token persists after refresh

Test Steps:
1. Attempt login with invalid credentials
2. Check localStorage
Expected Result:
? No token in localStorage
? User not authenticated

Test Steps:
1. Login with unverified user
2. Check localStorage
Expected Result:
? No token saved
? User redirected to verify

Test Steps:
1. Login with suspended user
2. Check localStorage
Expected Result:
? No token saved
? Error message shown

Test Steps:
1. Enable mock mode
2. Login with test user
Expected Result:
? Mock response returned
? Login successful

Test Steps:
1. Enable mock mode
2. Login with suspended user
Expected Result:
? Status check works
? Login blocked

Test Steps:
1. Disconnect network
2. Attempt login
Expected Result: ? Error: Network error. Please check your internet connection.

Test Steps: 1. Login when server error occurs
Expected Result: ? Error: Server error. Please try again later.
